nodes.text: The Revenge of the Sith - The Film Novel

The Revenge of the Sith - The Film Novel (French: La Revanche des Sith - Le Roman du film) is a junior novel adaptation of Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith. The Revenge of the Sith - The Film Novel was written by Elizabeth Barfety and published by Hachette Jeunesse on September 9, 2015.

The Clone Wars are raging. There is now open hostility between Chancellor Palpatine and the Jedi Council. Anakin Skywalker, a young Jedi Knight caught in the crossfire, is unsure what to do. Seduced by the promise of unprecedented power and tempted by the dark side of the Force, he pledges allegiance to the evil Darth Sidious and becomes Darth Vader. The Sith Lords then unite to prepare their revenge, which begins with the extermination of the Jedi. The only survivors of the massacre, Yoda and Obi Wan, set out in pursuit of the Sith. The hunt ends with a spectacular sword fight between Anakin and Obi Wan, which will decide the fate of the galaxy.
